mapper.select: /*kr.or.hku.counseling.mapper.getProList*/ SELECT a.pro_no , a.dept_cd , a.pro_lab , a.pro_lab_telno , a.pro_nm , b.dept_nm FROM professor a, department b WHERE a.dept_cd LIKE #{deptCd} AND a.pro_jbttl_cd LIKE 'fullpro' AND a.dept_cd = b.dept_cd

/*kr.or.hku.counseling.mapper.getLecList*/ SELECT a.lecap_no , a.lecsc_day , a.period_cd , a.lecsc_hour FROM lecture_schedule a, lecture_aply b WHERE a.lecap_no = b.lecap_no AND b.pro_no = #{proNo} AND b.aprv_stts_cd LIKE 'appv' AND b.lecap_yr LIKE TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY') AND b.lecap_sem = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM')) BETWEEN 2 AND 6 THEN 1 WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'MM')) BETWEEN 7 AND 12 THEN 2 ELSE 0 END

/*kr.or.hku.counseling.mapper.getCounsList*/ SELECT a.dscsn_no , a.std_no , a.pro_no , a.dscsn_rsn , a.dscsn_aply_dt , a.period_cd , a.attend_mode_cd , a.aprv_stts_cd FROM discussion a WHERE a.pro_no LIKE #{proNo} AND a.dscsn_aply_dt LIKE '%'||TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY')||'%'
